nodes.text: The Mitth family homestead was the headquarters of the Mitth, one of the Nine Ruling Families of the Chiss Ascendancy. The homestead was located in a massive underground cavern on the planet Csilla. Its dozen buildings were lit by an artificial sun and were surrounded by orchards and artificial lakes. The Trials, which allowed a Merit adoptive to become a Trial-born, took place at the homestead.
